metadata.synopsis: A captain (Gary Cooper) and an Army company fight gunrunners and Seminoles in the Everglades.

reviews: Might not be top notch Walsh but is still enjoyable.
Though not one of director Raoul Walsh's or star Gary Cooper's best actioners, the movie has some good moments due to visual style and on-location shooting.
Dubious war film, mixed with interesting jungle adventure from director Raoul Walsh.
